website_summaries.verdict: A precision cordless shaver that is known for its fast charge time. Detail your cut with snap-on precision trimmer.
pros: LED display shows you key information about your shaver, including battery indicator, cleaning indicator, and when to replace head
One-hour charge time gives you 40 minutes of shave time, or quick charge for five minutes to give you enough time for a quick shave
Great lift and cut motion, reduces snagging and pulling of hairs
cons: Some users find it doesn't shave as closely as desired

customer_reviews.title: An absolutely horrible shaver
customer_reviews.text: I was once a huge Norelco fan. But not any more. This shaver is one piece of plastic junk. I find myself having to run the shaver over the same section of my face many many times just to only cut the hairs. It takes way too long to shave with this nonsense. The technology, "lift & cut"? No way, it shaves like a dull rock. Save your money, buy some other brand.
customer_reviews.author: James Samas

customer_reviews.title: Single ring, poor performing razor.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Norelco electric shavers for 15 years and this product performs very poorly. I takes me three times longer to shave with this product and I have to clean up with a manual razor. Each of the three circular shaving pods only has a single ring that shaves, which limits the surface area and increases the time to shave.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P Hale

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: It works just fine for what it is. I got spoiled by a higher model, but got tired of paying $50-60 for replacement blades/heads. I bought this one because of the cheap replacement. I got what I paid for. The shave is egh.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M

customer_reviews.title: not as sharp as other models
customer_reviews.text: I've had other models from Phillips shavers, this one is a bit slow compared with other models, you have to use it for a few minutes in order to have a sharp shave, more expensive models have much better results... would not recommend this purchase, buy a more expensive model
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: 100 year old father in law loved it
customer_reviews.text: It worked great until my 100 yo father in law dropped it😞. We purchased this in Dec to replace the one he had for 10 yr plus . We received a call today that he had dropped it and wanted me to purchase the exact one for him. He has macular degeneration and this one was perfect for him. So I am replacing it .
customer_reviews.author: Nana 5

customer_reviews.title: Not close enough
customer_reviews.text: It does not get a close shave as it says it should. Not worth the money for the save.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver for sensitive skin!!
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the best head shaver I have ever bought. It gets my head super smoothe and on top of that it doesn’t hurt or feel scratchy when I use it. Super easy to clean and charges super quick. I have super sensitive skin and it’s hard to find a shaver that doesn’t make my head break out. Absolutely looooove this model. If you have sensitive skin like mine then this is the shaver for you!!
customer_reviews.author: Nudellife

customer_reviews.title: Great New Razor for my husband
customer_reviews.text: My husbands old Philips shaver died and he was really bummed. We ordered this and he likes it even better than his old one. It is VERY quiet and has a close shave. It is lightweight, yet performs well and is exactly what he was looking for at a terrific price!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea P

customer_reviews.title: I love this electric shaver and I am using it by ...
customer_reviews.text: expedited shipping, I love this electric shaver and I am using it by shaving with the the foam and it shaves as if I used a regular razor which means a perfect and clean shave. Love it ! Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Claude A. Cabache

customer_reviews.title: As time goes on they keep getting better. This 5100 is the best yet
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Norelco Shaver. As time goes on they keep getting better. This 5100 is the best yet. I get a great shave in about 2-3 min tops. I told friends about this and they said they prefer the old razor better without ever trying the eletric. How foolish, this is the answer
customer_reviews.author: paul  denicola

customer_reviews.title: Low power, not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this shaver for two years now and wouldn't recommend it. In most ways it's a good shaver but doesn't perform where it matters most. The low power motor makes it take forever to shave and several passes even if you're just doing a daily cleanup of short growth. I have a Remington R845 from 2001 that does a better and faster job with 2 of 3 working blades that have never been changed. This shaver is low power, overpriced and I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: freakazoidchimpanzee

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: I have had the same electric razor for years...not a Norelco. I finally decided a new one was in order. In the few days I've had the Norelco, I am most pleased. It gives a good shave an d it takes less time than the old one.
customer_reviews.author: James Wetzel

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a piece of junk. I now feel bad that a gave an ok review for a cheaper 39$ shaver I wanted to try first. I just got this today and got 2/3 the way shaving my head and it got jammed. Trying to clear the jam, this thing explodes into half a dozen pieces that do not go back together easy. Thank goodness I didn’t try this before I had to go to work and look like a leper. This thing is garbage thank goodness I got the protection on plan I better get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Simple, not the fanciest, always gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted the extra blade for cutting this offered, & an easier cleaning method, but other than that, went just above the basic line..AND..very pleased so far! Battery life surprisingly gets me through 7-10 shaves...blade cut is smooth and not irritated...for the money, and not needing this to be a travel razor (no bag included), this model is great!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan M.

customer_reviews.title: Zero battery life
customer_reviews.text: Apparently, this needs to be kept plugged in at all times when not using it or it quickly goes dead. And on top of that, it won't work while it is plugged in. So no, I absolutely do not recommend it and will never buy another Norelco product.
customer_reviews.author: William Kloezeman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shaver overall, but the trimming attachment is lacking
customer_reviews.text: Very good shaver overall, quiet, shaves closely, pleasant to use. However the trimming attachment is wimpy - the blade is too narrow and has shallow depth, it takes a lot of passes to trim all thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: xilonic

customer_reviews.title: A gift
customer_reviews.text: This was sent as a gift. It arrived a day early and was well received and appreciated. Cannot speak to anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Love the shaver. I feel it doesn't get as close as I would like but it does the job. It's easy to maintain and the battery life is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver
customer_reviews.text: Surprisedly smooth shave with no skin redness...very pleased The biggest negative was trying to open the package the shaver came in!
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert K.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for good quality shaver. And truly, this is such an amazing product worth every penny. Lastly, I also like to thank Amazon for making this product available in my region. Tks, Damian.
customer_reviews.author: Damian G.

customer_reviews.title: Cool price but,that no is important
customer_reviews.text: I bought wrong item,it’s too soft,slow,its power is not enough.
customer_reviews.author: jose m perez

customer_reviews.title: I like Norelco
customer_reviews.text: First. I like the design. Easy to clean. Shave very close. Leave my skin smooth. Very happy with the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Z.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my Dad
customer_reviews.text: My Dad loves his old one but he's dropped it quite a few times in the shower so now he feels better because he now has a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Camaro man

customer_reviews.title: Bad razor
customer_reviews.text: Literally the worse razor I've ever used. It takes forever to actually do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Crosby

customer_reviews.title: ғollow cυѕтoмerѕ ιnѕтrυcтιonѕ
customer_reviews.text: ιтeм waѕ never receιved!!! leғт ιnѕтrυcтιonѕ ғor a call, and a ĸnocĸ on door, тнeѕe ιnѕтrυcтιonѕ were noт ғollowed, ѕayѕ pacĸage waѕ delιvered, ι don'т нave a porcн тo leave ιт on, wнιcн ιѕ wнy ι aѕĸed ғor a call and ĸnocĸ......never goт мy pacĸage!!! wanт a reғυnd!!!! aѕap!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Fukem_all

customer_reviews.title: Great shave
customer_reviews.text: Battery charges quickly. Very comfortable shave from the start. Like it!
customer_reviews.author: Cdune1

customer_reviews.title: They make better, closer shaving electric razors.
customer_reviews.text: While the shaver works well enough, I don’t think it shaves closely enough. The plastic shaver screen cover falls off if you just look at it. I’ve has wet/dry electric shavers in the past. This one is by far the least effective
customer_reviews.author: David A. Rouse

customer_reviews.title: Product not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product listed as 5100 series. Product delivered is 5000 series.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Nice Razor
customer_reviews.text: I've had a Norelco shaver for decades now and just ordered this one recently. I like the fact that it comes apart easily for cleaning and has a nice grip to it, however, I don't think it does as good a job as my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Electric Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Liked the the way it glides across the face to give a quick and close shave. Also the cleaning is super easy. A quick wash with warm water and your done, and excellent battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Great electric shaver
customer_reviews.text: This little shaver is small and does a great job. It does a better job then my big Philips Norelco Electric shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: a real value for the $$
customer_reviews.text: excellent and totally un-expected value with at least 2 useful features....... (water clean & Batt. life)
customer_reviews.author: WHITE OAKS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shaver, I recomend it.
customer_reviews.text: Very good shaver. I use it every day since my job requires me to do it. Very smooth ant close cut. I like it a lot. Battery life is great. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tito G. Morales

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Great razor for the price it shaves smoothly with no pulling on the whiskers.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Electric razors
customer_reviews.text: This rotary razor can't compete with a Panasonic 3-5 blade electric razor. It pulled at my beard and the on button is located exactly where my thumb rests on the razor. Awkward design. Also, blades are in a cheap plastic housing. Try again.
customer_reviews.author: BILL E.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price. Not as close a shave as predecessor but still good.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Martinez

customer_reviews.title: NOT DURABLE IN ANY WAY!! I do not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for husband work good for 1st 6 weeks. But he dropped it in sink 1 time and now these blades spin too slow to cut.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Worst razor I have ever owned!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible razor!! Tugs and pulls at beard even with daily shaving!!! Acts like dull blades but just purchased as new!! Hate this razor!! Never again!!
customer_reviews.author: Philip McArdle

customer_reviews.title: Does not give a close shave. Shaved with Norelco ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not give a close shave. Shaved with Norelco shavers for over sixty years. This is a piece of Junk which I will dump.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for the last 6 months. I liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Ganesh

customer_reviews.title: its just ok
customer_reviews.text: it does not shave the way i thought it should i should have purchased a better one i have to go over my face 3 to 4 times to get a clean shave i went back to razors
customer_reviews.author: philip tasker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would cut better than the $40 ones but I don’t notice any difference.
customer_reviews.author: kevin noesen

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: this brand good in past. may have gotten a lemon. hope it is only one faulty item
customer_reviews.author: mss

customer_reviews.title: I really like this Razr
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Razr. It cuts very close it's comfortable to use it charges well it's a good razor
customer_reviews.author: TERRY

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hubby
customer_reviews.text: This new razor was a perfect Christmas present for my husband. He had been unhappy with his old razor and when he saw this one advertised on TV, he kept saying how much sense the design made. Off to Amazon for me and the razor arrived quickly so I was able to wrap and hide it until it could be stashed under the Christmas tree. He raves happily every time he uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Great shaver - a least my third or maybe fourth Norelco, (hey, I'm 64) each one has shaved better than the last one. In half a dozen years, when these batteries are shot, I'll probably get another. Improved head design makes cleaning even easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Philips Norelco Electric Shaver 5100 Wet & Dry
customer_reviews.text: Really works well! Thought it had a carrying pouch but it doesn't .
customer_reviews.author: Lewis G

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap cheap
customer_reviews.text: Feels cheap, looks cheap. This is not the reason I returned it thought: it was DOA. A piece of it fell off when it lift it out of its case.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: As good as any shaver I have tried in the last 50 years
customer_reviews.text: No electric shaver works very well for me - especially with a three or four day beard. But this one I find acceptable. Washing the head after each shave seems to help. The trimmer is very good. I would say this shaver is not great, but as good as anything I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.  More than pleased with this product.  David Wilson
customer_reviews.text: comfortable and close shave at reasonable price. Would recommend this razor. David Wilson
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shave!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best norelco shaver i have ever owned. Great Shave and easy clean!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Schlosser

customer_reviews.title: New electric shaver
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. Slim and sleek. Still not enough power. Shaves very slowly
customer_reviews.author: John C. Cawdrey

customer_reviews.title: Not efficient
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to get a close shave. Blades pull at hair. I can shave quicker and better using a manual razor
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Improved features to replace another Norelco that was several years old.
customer_reviews.author: Karon

customer_reviews.title: That the product can be cleaned with water
customer_reviews.text: He product gives a clean smooth save and handles well. Too soon to determined battery rate.
customer_reviews.author: lewis Anglin

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very weak, not a close shave at all. More hassle than it’s ridiculous price.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry Vaccaro

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs down on this Norelco 5100.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and it just doesn't do a good job. At all. It's awful. He had to go back over everything with a disposable razor and he tried it 3 times for a week. Completely defeats the purpose of paying for a "nice" electric shaver. I was able to return it for a refund through Amazon Prime. I'm not sure what shaver to purchase now. He would really rather not have to continue using the disposable razors.
customer_reviews.author: TexasTornado

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I have used a straight razor for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have used a straight razor for years. This takes some getting used to but really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I actually got a better shave from my old
customer_reviews.text: Razor did not live up to my expectations. I actually got a better shave from my old, less expensive model.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Kenney

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of crap don't buy it it falls apart
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well when dry or wet. Works well in the shower. Long lasting battery life. Fast delivery. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Elon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It gives a great shave! And mostly the easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stanley

customer_reviews.title: The trimmer arrangement is not as good as on my old Arciept
customer_reviews.text: Woks well and shaves fairly close. The trimmer arrangement is not as good as on my old Arciept,
customer_reviews.author: Karl H. Wallischeck

customer_reviews.title: ok product
customer_reviews.text: not as close of a shave as my old one
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Good close shave and I easy to maintain
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. Good close shave and I easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i liked the old version where it was integrated
customer_reviews.text: OK.. but having to have a separate attachment for the trimmer is a pain and i'm in fear of losing it....i liked the old version where it was integrated.
customer_reviews.author: Doug K

customer_reviews.title: Great electric razor
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Only drawback is it is difficult to get upper lip/close to nose well.
customer_reviews.author: jknechtly

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Not very good. It takes a whiletter to get a clean shave. It is not a fast or close shave as Philips claims.
customer_reviews.author: B K

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaver
customer_reviews.text: We got for my son's birthday. He loves it. He said it does not irritate his skin and smooth. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA

customer_reviews.title: I've had a close shave with this on many occasions!
customer_reviews.text: It's rechargeable AND waterproof to clean a point not mentioned in the advertising.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: ... very solid product for someone wanting a mid priced nice razor! I have not had any problems with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid product for someone wanting a mid priced nice razor! I have not had any problems with it so far after around a month of daily use. The razor cuts good, but you still Have to go over your face 3-4 times to get a good shave. It's plenty good enough for me and I don't know if that's about as good as they get for an electric razor or not but I like this razor. I could give it a five out of five but I just don't know how it compares to more expensive razors so I will leave a Storia. That's my only reason though it could definitely be five.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: 5th Norelco
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th Norelco. Last one still works I wanted a new one after almost 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Madeira beach Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good for a month....then...
customer_reviews.text: My husband would have given this a 5 if it didn't stop working already. Christmas gift that he loved. In hospital most of January and first part of February. Just tried to use and no go. It is fully charged. Now it is too late to exchange for a new one and we have an $80.00 paperweight. Don't buy unless you only need a great shave for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: ... always own Norelco shavers and they have always been good. this one has attachments instead of a flip ...
customer_reviews.text: have always own Norelco shavers and they have always been good. this one has attachments instead of a flip out trimer and it does not cut as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a 5000 not a 5100. It was also $75.00 not 26.00
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dull blades right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The blades were dull and it took forever to get a shave and even after all that time it was a bad shave!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhhh
customer_reviews.text: I only use this if I absolutely have to and I barely have facial hair for being in my late 20s
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, shave is not a close one
customer_reviews.text: I guess producing a quality product has really gone down for Phillips Norelco. This is a horrible shaver. The $29 dollar Chinese shaver I previously had was much better and provided a much better and closer shave and was usb rechargeable. but the head broke after traveling with it for a year. I would have bought it again but it was no longer available. This seems flimsier and power button is in an awkward place and causes me to power it off accidentally.
customer_reviews.author: SIRENO

customer_reviews.title: Meets Expectation
customer_reviews.text: I can see how this shaver would not work well for someone who has a five-o-clock shadow by 2pm. My stubble is light and thin, so this shaver works perfect. I recommend using it daily instead of letting growth get out of hand. It is not designed to shave stubble that has any length at all. Use the trimmer to take it back down to zero and then shave.
customer_reviews.author: William Boland

customer_reviews.title: Discontinued item
customer_reviews.text: The shaver came with no charging cord or protective cap for the blades. Called the Phillips/Norelco contact number for them to send the missing parts, only to find out this is a discontinued model and recommendation to return it to Amazon. Amazon is normally better than this, but I now have to go through the return process. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: It's a Norelco. The best - in my humble opinion.
customer_reviews.text: I've always been impressed by the reliability and durability of Norelco products. This one is my latest favorite. I haven't tossed out my old Norelco model. It still works (10 years old). I keep it in my suitcase for travel. I expect many years of faithful service from this one just like all previous Norelco shavers I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Karl N Tellefsen

customer_reviews.title: its Very Good Razor
customer_reviews.text: This Razor is nice and sharp and does a nice job. HOWEVER, Like another reviewer stated, "This Razor is Underpowered". It is, The shaver heads could move ALOT Faster! Which would cut the shaving time in half! Other than that, its a nice shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander E  Brenner

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Does not shave as well as Norelcos I have owned in the past, but it does do the job. I find I need to use a safety razor also sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This shaver works as expected and does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: The shaver arrived on time and appeared and worked as expected. I love the fact that it comes with its own electrical charger. Liked it so well, I ordered one for my son-in-law.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS RAZOR
customer_reviews.text: Everytime we go to use this razor all of the parts fall out of it and its difficult to line up the blades to put it back together. Do not waste your money. I just bought this in November 2019 and I am not even able to return it.....
customer_reviews.author: Connorsmom

customer_reviews.title: The best electric razor out of so many I have bought!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best ever!!!!!! It shaves my face better than all the others I have bought and tried. It does a smooth sheave, no problems-absolutely the VERY BEST!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mixed review on this one
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes it as a shaver a lot. As the person who cuts his hair using the trimmer, I hated it. It pulls and hurts when you trim and shave a neckline. He shaves with it and I go back to his old shaver to trim - painless.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Pace Sipos

customer_reviews.title: My wife likes my smooth face.
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life. Fits my hand well. Does a great job compared to other electric razors that I've used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: CoryKman

customer_reviews.title: Best on daily use.
customer_reviews.text: This product works best on short stubble, but it gives a fairly close shave.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen E. Meeks

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: No good for thicker and tupid facial hair. Just ok for traveling
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: The worst shave, so much razor burn and doesn’t cut many hairs. Takes longer than a normal shave to get a crappy shave.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Easy to handle, clean & store. Travels well too.
customer_reviews.author: kimnpgh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I liked how easy it is to use and clean this razor
customer_reviews.author: Peter J. VanScoy

customer_reviews.title: Older ones worked better
customer_reviews.text: Does not pick up nor cut longer hairs , ( especially thin longer ones ) nearly as good as the older previous versions like the 7810 XL, or the 8160 XL
customer_reviews.author: ranman

customer_reviews.title: Forget Blades!
customer_reviews.text: The grip is sweet. Soapy hands don't slip with the way they made this thing. I'd buy it again and again. Beats a blade with no contest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking elsewhere, this is the one you want.
customer_reviews.text: Best shaver ever built. After using mine, bought two for my sons. Will continue to buy this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Decent shave. Like that I can use it in the shower. Unlike my ex wife.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Scott

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.. waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Does not look work, don’t waste your money! Although it could’ve just been my “luck”/ “ karma” or lack there of.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Davidson

customer_reviews.title: ... I have to depend on feel so it is fine
customer_reviews.text: It shaves well and close as an older perso I have to depend on feel so it is fine
customer_reviews.author: Donald R Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Phillips Norelco Electric Shaver shaves close, is easy to clean and charge. It's perfect
customer_reviews.author: reggaelady

product_meta.title: Philips Norelco Electric Shaver 5100 Wet & Dry, S5210/81, with Precision Trimmer
product_meta.description: The Shaver 5100 adds speed and comfort to your morning routine. Its MultiPrecision blades raise and cut long and short hairs while shaving heads independently move in 5 directions to ensure close skin contact for a faster and closer shave, even on neck and jaw line..Automatic voltage- 100-240 V
feature_bullets: A close, fast shave. 75% of men beat their shaving time S5000 (no turbo) compared to Philips Click and Style
MultiPrecision Blade System - Blades raise then cut long and short hairs for a fast shave
5-direction Flex Heads flex in 5 directions for a fast close shave
Aquatec Wet and Dry- Get a comfortable dry or refreshing wet shave
Smart Click precision trimmer for perfect mustache and sideburn trimming
